column4: please help! I upgrade to 9.1 and my partitions will not automount :(
the root ext3 and possibly the swap
I can mount manually, but not something i want to do every time :\
in recovery mode I do it manually
use pastebin and copy your /etc/fstab there
http://paste.ubuntu.com/330669/   you will be able to tell i've been tooling with it
as per your pastebin, the root is mounter, what isn't is the swap
you need to remove the # in the 8th line
ill give it a whirl.  ill be back
unless your root partition's id changed, but that's something that rarely happens
